body_html:
@peterjc123 Very nice catch, I don't know how we forgot about this.

Adding sufficient API annotations to Caffe2 is probably going to take a lot of work, because Caffe2 was never written with correct symbol annotations in mind. I wonder if there is a way to selectively apply "export all" to certain files instead.

Adding sufficient API annotations to Caffe2 is probably going to take a lot of work, because Caffe2 was never written with correct symbol annotations in mind. I wonder if there is a way to selectively apply "export all" to certain files instead.
body:
@peterjc123 Very nice catch, I don't know how we forgot about this.

Adding sufficient API annotations to Caffe2 is probably going to take a lot of work, because Caffe2 was never written with correct symbol annotations in mind. I wonder if there is a way to selectively apply "export all" to certain files instead.
